payload.content: Development will move to the cloud because agents need to scale off of local machines.

name: Development will move to the cloud because agents need to scale off of local mac
content: Development will move to the cloud because agents need to scale off of local machines.

payload.content: The primary challenge for teams of agents is establishing a communication pattern and tracking their memory.

name: The primary challenge for teams of agents is establishing a communication patter
content: The primary challenge for teams of agents is establishing a communication pattern and tracking their memory.

payload.content: Instead of building agent-specific versions of human collaboration tools (like Slack or Notion), focus on minimal underlying infrastructure for agents to operate.

name: Instead of building agent-specific versions of human collaboration tools (like S
content: Instead of building agent-specific versions of human collaboration tools (like Slack or Notion), focus on minimal underlying infrastructure for agents to operate.

payload.content: Essential primitives for multi-agent collaboration include: cloud operations for scalable communication, an easy and reliable inter-agent communication mechanism (e.g., message bus), persistent datastore for tracking work and output, a powerful coding agent, and a human-agent interface for steering and review.

name: Essential primitives for multi-agent collaboration include: cloud operations for
content: Essential primitives for multi-agent collaboration include: cloud operations for scalable communication, an easy and reliable inter-agent communication mechanism (e.g., message bus), persistent datastore for tracking work and output, a powerful coding agent, and a human-agent interface for steering and review.

payload.content: Coding agents will be the foundation of all knowledge work because coding is the 'uber' skill that allows agents to do anything.

name: Coding agents will be the foundation of all knowledge work because coding is the
content: Coding agents will be the foundation of all knowledge work because coding is the 'uber' skill that allows agents to do anything.
